item.title: People Don't Resist Change
item.description: People don’t resist change. People embrace change when it’s obvious that the change will be to their benefit. People embrace change when they believe those benefits will be realized. People embrace change when the expected benefits outweigh the cost of change. People embrace change when it’s obvious that the cost of not changing is more than the cost of changing.
